The correct answer is:

C. Create Pieces as a base unit of measure. Add Box as an item unit of measure with the quantity per unit set to 12.

Explanation:

The customer wants to sell items in boxes and pallets, but refer to the items as pieces. Each box contains 12 pieces. Each pallet contains 144 pieces.

The base unit of measure is the smallest unit of measure that is used to track inventory. In this case, the base unit of measure is pieces.

An item unit of measure is a unit of measure that is used to sell or purchase an item. In this case, the item unit of measure is a box.

The quantity per unit is the number of base units of measure that are in one item unit of measure. In this case, the quantity per unit is 12.

Therefore, the correct way to assign the unit of measures is to create Pieces as a base unit of measure and add Box as an item unit of measure with the quantity per unit set to 12.
